title: Lauren Conrad welcomes her second child with husband William Tell
text:
Lauren Conrad has welcomed her second child with husband William Tell.

The Hills vet shared the happy news with her 6.1M Instagram followers with a drawing of her holding a newborn, her spouse next to her and her first child Liam James Tell, aged two, with a sign that read, 'It's a boy.' Two family dogs were also in the sketch.

'Our sweet baby boy, Charlie Wolf Tell, has arrived!' the blonde beauty wrote in her caption.

Cute image: Lauren Conrad has welcomed her second child with husband William Tell. The Hills vet shared the happy news with her 6.1M Instagram followers with a drawing of her holding a newborn, her spouse and her first child Liam James Tell, aged two

Getting ready for baby: Here the reality TV star is seen in April at the LC Lauren Conrad Spring Collection launch in NYC

This comes three weeks after the 33-year-old star shared a photo of her baby bump while in a bikini.

The fashion designer cradled her bump and wrote about feeling unprepared.

Standing a breezeway in flip flops, her brown and white patterned cover up flowed behind her.

Lauren looked down at her growing bump, that was bare. The FIT alum captioned the photo, 'Currently somewhere between “Get this baby out of me!” and “Stay in there kid! We still have so much prep to do!"'

Arty: Conrad had every inch of pregnancy glow, as she showed her nine month bump to her Instagram followers three weeks ago

Announcement: The FIT alum captioned this photo, 'Currently somewhere between “Get this baby out of me!” and “Stay in there kid! We still have so much prep to do"' (pictured in her pregnancy announcement from April)

She went on to thank her friend Hannah for getting the sweet picture: 'Thank you @hannahskvarla for taking this photo on our way back from the pool. This counts as a maternity shoot, right?'

Th star announced her second pregnancy in April.

After getting together in 2012, she and William married in 2014 and welcomed son Liam James in 2017.

Soon to be four: After getting together in 2012, she married William Tell in 2014 and welcomed, son, Liam James in 2017

Lauren has discussed how her second pregnancy has been more of a challenge as now she has a toddler to chase after.

'With Liam, we didn't decide [on a name] until he was born. We had options, but we liked the idea of meeting our baby first,' she told People this summer.

'The biggest thing [with this pregnancy] is that I already have a child this time. I’m definitely more tired. Pregnancy is much more difficult when you have a two-year-old running around.'

The Asking For A Friend podcaster called it 'a huge convenience' to partner up with Amazon's online Baby Registry to get essentials like a $906 self-rocking SNOO Smart Sleeper.
description: The Hills vet shared the happy news with her 6.1M Instagram followers with a drawing of her holding a newborn, her spouse and her first child Liam James Tell, aged two.
